June 23, 1959
Prof. Bruce H. Westley
Department of Journalism
University of Wisconsin
Madison, Wisconsin
Dear Bruce:
We have a rush request for recommendations for
a good research man orientated in television or radio to
head up the U. S* Office of Education work on the Title
\Tll grants* The job will be a GS 14 or 15, pays from
$11,355 up to $12,770 or so. They want the NAEB to help
find the best man possible* The problem is we need some
names by Thursday afternoon. I would appreciate your
calling or wiring me (collect if you wish) any suggestions
you have*
Cordially,
SLB:na#
Samuel L* Becker
Chairman, NAEB
Research Committee
